platform.summary: Galaxy Docker repository for image analysis
quotas: Server: Disk and run quotas. Can be used anonymously, or from a login.  Anyone can create a login.
citations: Wollmann, T. S. (2020). [Deep Learning for Detection and Segmentation in High-Content Microscopy Images](https://archiv.ub.uni-heidelberg.de/volltextserver/28827/) [Dissertation, Heidelberg University].
sponsors: The [Freiburg Galaxy Team](https://usegalaxy-eu.github.io/freiburg/) but also collectively by groups and individuals from across Europe
